50 Discharge Cycles

Powerwall will be limited to a maximum 50 discharge cycles per year. An event can range from a very small amount (less than 1 kWh), up to the full capacity, excluding backup reserve.

Extended Warranty

Receive five additional years on the warranty of your new Powerwall while you remain connected to the Tesla Energy Plan.
